SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttackEffect
Implementação do efeito de ataque para cartas do tipo ATTACK.
AttributeEffect
Implementação do efeito de atributo para cartas do tipo ATTRIBUTE.
Card
Representa uma carta no jogo Dueling Protocol.
Card.CardType
Enumeração que define os tipos possíveis de cartas no jogo.
CardEffect
Interface que define o contrato para efeitos de cartas no jogo.
CardPack
Interface for card packs in the game store.
CardPackFactory
Factory class for creating card packs of different types.
CardRepository
Repository for card data and card stock management.
ClientHandler
Handles communication with a single client connected to the game server.
ConcurrentMatchmakingService
Thread-safe implementation of the MatchmakingService interface.
DefenseEffect
Implementação do efeito de defesa para cartas do tipo DEFENSE.
EquipmentEffect
Implementation of the equipment effect for EQUIPMENT type cards.
GameClient
Main client class for the Dueling Protocol card game.
GameFacade
Facade class that provides a simplified interface for game operations.
GameServer
Main server class for the Dueling Protocol card game.
GameSession
Represents an active game session between two players.
InMemoryPlayerRepository
In-memory implementation of the PlayerRepository interface.
MagicEffect
Implementação do efeito mágico para cartas do tipo MAGIC.
Match
Representa uma partida entre dois jogadores no jogo Dueling Protocol.
MatchmakingService
Interface for matchmaking services.
PingServer
UDP server for ping measurements.
Player
Representa um jogador no jogo Dueling Protocol.
PlayerRepository
Interface for player data access operations.
PlayerRepositoryJson
JSON-based implementation of the PlayerRepository interface.
PurchaseResult
Represents the result of a card pack purchase operation.
PurchaseResult.PurchaseStatus
Enum representing the possible statuses of a card pack purchase.
PurchaseStatus
 
ScenarioEffect
Implementation of the scenario effect for SCENARIO type cards.
StoreService
Interface for store services.
StoreServiceImpl
Implementation of the StoreService interface.
